name: cut oak limb
description: a large, cut limb with greyish-brown bark
details: A large limb cut off at the base.  It has greyish-brown bark, hairless twigs, and pointed, brownish buds.  Its leaves are a deep, dark green on top and paler underneath. They are arranged alternately along the twigs, and are broadly oblong with three to six lobes.
keywords: large cut limb greyish-brown bark hairless twigs pointed brownish buds
